products.description: Offering unparalleled precision and truly special esthetics, the Formula 1 watch range is inspired by the brand’s long-lasting partnerships with motor racing teams and charismatic ambassadors. With its luxurious sports-lux feel and high performance features, this caliber TAG Heuer Formula 1 Men’s Watch will take you from the office to the sports field with effortless ease. Housed beneath a sapphire crystal lens for optimum protection, this visually striking timepiece boasts a midnight blue dial, a date display window at 3 o’clock, a gold bezel, a 41mm steel and gold plated case, as well as a gold and steel bracelet strap. This timepiece is also powered by Quartz Movement.

comments.name: Jane Snow
comments.comment: We supply a series of design principles, practical patterns and high quality design resources (Sketch and Axure), to help people create their product prototypes beautifully and efficiently.

comments.name: Jake Snake
